references.reason: This paper is foundational to the work presented here, as it introduces the concept of denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which are used extensively throughout the paper.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP is used for evaluating the image generation quality and also forms a key part of the model's training process.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a model that is leveraged in this paper's experiments.
This paper proposes a method for generating 3D models from 2D diffusion models which is used as a foundation for the 3D generation aspect of this paper.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates that diffusion models surpass GANs in image generation capabilities, justifying the use of diffusion models in the current work.
